articles.author: Compiled by Lynn Butler
articles.title: Petersen, Malan rewarded with maiden Proteas contracts
articles.description: Cricket South Africa announced the 16 Proteas men's players, who got awarded national contracts for the 2022/2023 season.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa (CSA) announced the Proteas' 16 national contracts for the 2022/23 season.
  • After stellar seasons, Batters Janneman Malan and Keegan Petersen received their maiden… [+2759 chars]

articles.title: Yogi Adityanath to take oath on March 25, top BJP leadership to attend: Report
articles.description: The ceremony will be held at Lucknow's Ekana cricket stadium, which the Yogi government, in its first term, renamed after BJP stalwart and former Prime Minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee.
articles.content: Yogi Adityanath, who led the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) to victory in the recently-held Uttar Pradesh assembly elections, will be sworn-in for his second term as the chief minister on March 25, Hin… [+1894 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
